name: Ancient Tactics
description:
Play the browser demo at https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/743764

Are you the tactician the city of Belrin was looking for?

Here only your skills count, as you fight against always equal enemy in the single- or multiplayer skirmishes.

Set the behavior of your units like:
- how close they keep to their own units.
- shoot faster or more precise but in shorter range.
- hit stronger or faster.
- heal closest, weakest or strongest first.
- go berserk and lose some health or not.

Watch them fight, when you're ready and carefully watch the enemy to guess their current behavior settings.

Clime on leader boards improving your tactics. Use different strategy in single and multiplayer. In one time counts, in the other it doesn't.

Use various structures, like protective magic towers, portals and walls to your advantage. 

Use units special abilities activated during the battle. 

Get the downloadable version here for better quality, performance and to access  multiplayer.

If you are playing in the browser, click the blue full screen button on the right side below the game.

Please, submit feedback to help develop this project!
